1.caption_en:
Caption:
A blank "Ecosystem Strategy" canvas showing labeled horizontal layers (Sustainability, Ecosystem Journey, Engagement, Intelligence, Infrastructure, Success Factors) over a light grid, with a translucent horizontal arrow across the Ecosystem Journey row and a large translucent vertical arrow down the center. The footer includes the title "ECOSYSTEM STRATEGY", a PIK logo, a small "fb one" icon, and a QR code.

{
  "title": "Ecosystem Strategy Canvas",
  "type": "template",
  "language": "English",
  "description": "A blank strategy canvas with labeled horizontal layers and a grid for mapping ecosystem components; includes large translucent directional arrows and footer branding.",
  "layout": {
    "rows": 6,
    "row_labels": [
      "SUSTAINABILITY LAYER",
      "ECOSYSTEM JOURNEY",
      "ENGAGEMENT LAYER",
      "INTELLIGENCE LAYER",
      "INFRASTRUCTURE LAYER",
      "SUCCESS FACTORS"
    ],

    "grid_fillable": true
  },
  "visual_elements": {
    "background_cells": "pale pastel colors by row",
    "arrows": [
      {
        "orientation": "horizontal",
        "position_row": "ECOSYSTEM JOURNEY",
        "style": "translucent red/pink, double-headed"
      },
      {
        "orientation": "vertical",

      }
    ],
    "color_scheme_by_row": {

    },
    "footer": {

      ],
      "qr_code_present": true
    }
  },
  "detected_text_snippet": [
    "SUSTAINABILITY LAYER",

    "ENGAGEMENT LAYER",
    "INTELLIGENCE LAYER",
    "INFRASTRUCTURE LAYER",
    "SUCCESS FACTORS",
    "ECOSYSTEM STRATEGY",

2.caption_en:
A minimalist, semi-transparent geometric pattern: a horizontal pale red band with left and right arrowheads overlays a white grid, with a centered light-blue triangle near the lower center and pale green rectangles along the top.

{
  "type": "abstract_geometric_pattern",
  "dominant_colors": [
    "pale red",
    "light green",
    "light blue",
    "white"
  ],
  "shapes": [
    {
      "shape": "horizontal_band",
      "color": "pale red",
      "opacity": 0.6,
      "bbox": [0.05, 0.32, 0.90, 0.28],
      "description": "translucent rectangular band spanning the image center horizontally"
    },
    {
      "shape": "arrow_head",
      "side": "left",
      "color": "pale red",
      "opacity": 0.6,
      "bbox": [0.00, 0.32, 0.18, 0.28],
      "description": "left-pointing triangular arrow overlapping the band"
    },
    {
      "shape": "arrow_head",
      "side": "right",
      "color": "pale red",
      "opacity": 0.6,
      "bbox": [0.82, 0.32, 0.18, 0.28],
      "description": "right-pointing triangular arrow overlapping the band"
    },
    {
      "shape": "triangle",
      "orientation": "up",
      "color": "light blue",
      "opacity": 0.5,
      "bbox": [0.35, 0.52, 0.30, 0.30],
      "description": "centered triangle rising from lower center beneath the band"
    },
    {
      "shape": "rectangles_row",
      "color": "light green",
      "opacity": 0.6,
      "bbox": [0.00, 0.00, 1.00, 0.18],
      "count_estimate": 5,
      "description": "row of pale green rectangular blocks along the top"
    },
    {
      "shape": "grid",
      "color": "white",
      "line_color": "white",
      "coverage": "full",
      "cell_size_estimate": 0.14,
      "description": "subtle white grid of vertical and horizontal lines over the whole image"
    }
  ],
  "layout": "centered horizontal band with symmetric left/right arrowheads, grid overlay, and a centered lower triangle",
  "style": "flat, translucent, minimalist, geometric",
  "symmetry": "approximate left-right symmetry",
  "contains_text": false,
  "contains_people": false,
  "confidence": 0.92
}

3.caption_en:
A translucent blue vertical double-headed arrow runs down the center of a pale grid, with a translucent red horizontal double-headed arrow across the top.

{
  "artifact_type": "illustration",
  "description": "Centered translucent blue vertical double-headed arrow and a translucent red horizontal double-headed arrow over a pale gridded background.",
  "background": {
    "type": "grid",
    "rows": 6,
    "columns": 4,
    "cell_color_hex": "#e6f7f7",
    "grid_line_color_hex": "#ffffff",
    "top_strip_color_hex": "#f3f7d9"
  },
  "elements": [
    {
      "id": "arrow_vertical",
      "type": "double_headed_arrow",
      "orientation": "vertical",
      "color_hex": "#6fc0e8",
      "opacity": 0.35,
      "position_percent": { "x": 50, "y": 50 },
      "size_percent": { "width": 20, "height": 80 },
      "z_order": 1,
      "notes": "Centered, spans most of the image height with arrowheads at top and bottom."
    },
    {
      "id": "arrow_horizontal",
      "type": "double_headed_arrow",
      "orientation": "horizontal",
      "color_hex": "#f2a7a7",
      "opacity": 0.35,
      "position_percent": { "x": 50, "y": 12 },
      "size_percent": { "width": 80, "height": 18 },
      "z_order": 2,
      "notes": "Located near the top, spans across the width with arrowheads at left and right."
    }
  ]
}
